Job Description:
Essential Programming Language Knowledge: .NET Framework 2.0,  3.0,  3.5,  4.0,  C# .NET,  ASP .NET,  WCF,  MVC,  Windows Forms,  ADO & .NET ,  Java Script.

Database: Microsoft SQL Server 2005/ 2008 with TSQL and stored procedures.

Job Responsibilities:

Determine source data  (input) ,  processing requirements  (output) ,  output formats,  timing and cost estimates.

Verify that system meets performance criteria.

Design,  implement,  and document procedures.

Design/ modify,  code,  debug,  test,  and document moderately complex application systems.

Develop and/ or teach seminars,  workshops,  or classes to users or other

Consult on the use of moderately complex software packages.

Architect and develop software solutions to meet requirements

Interface with customers throughout the life cycle of project

Review and assure total quality of deliverables

Review projects and extract reuse architectures

Contribute to developing software processes

Keyskills: C#,  ASP.NET,  MVC4,  WCF,  Entity Framework etc
